CutSceneText.Text: Inside the Empyrean Crucible, you'll find a Recordkeeper waiting for you.
When one of your group members tells the Recordkeeper of your intention to enter,
your opponent will be summoned, and your training will begin.
If you are defeated during training, you must wait in the Ready Room....
until the rest of your comrades finish their training.
You may rejoin the fight by giving a Worthiness Ticket to an Arbiter.
Your training will continue until no one from your group is left standing.
And when a level is completed, the Recordkeeper will decide whether to move you to the next round...or not.
